alert.note: Alert for Giles; Hickman; Lawrence; Lewis; Maury; Perry; Wayne; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 10:28AM CDT until August 07 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Central Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... Giles County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Perry County in Middle Tennessee... Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1027 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Centerville to 7 miles south of Collinwood, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Columbia, Lawrenceburg, Pulaski, Hohenwald, Centerville, Waynesboro, Spring Hill, Mount Pleasant, Thompson`s Station, Loretto, Collinwood, Summertown, St. Joseph, Elkton, Minor Hill, Ethridge, Lynnville, Gordonsburg and Kimmins. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 22, and between mile markers 36 and 66. Interstate 840 between mile markers 11 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Giles; Hickman; Lawrence; Lewis; Maury; Perry; Wayne; Williamson
